status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4sdej","text":"L-Leucine (C6H13NO2) 2.62g (0.02 mol) and Cetyl alcohol (C16H34O) 4.85g (0.02mol) were dissolved in toluene (75 ml). P-toluene sulphonic acid monohydrate (C7H8O3S.H2O) 7.60g (0.04mol) was added.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":194}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"368rn","text":"The reaction mixture was refluxed at 95℃ for 10 hours.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":54}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mpqf","text":"The progress of the reaction was monitored by TLC (15% ethyl acetate in Hexane).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":80}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kuf2","text":"After completion of the reaction, toluene was removed using rotary evaporator and allowed to cool to room temperature.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":118}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfgco","text":"The residue obtained was dissolved in dichloromethane (75ml) and washed with 10% sodium carbonate solution (70ml, twice), water (50ml, twice) and brine solution (50 ml).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":169}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hvr4","text":"The organic layer was dried over anhydrous magnesium sulphate. The dichloromethane was removed using rotary evaporator.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":119}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6grr1","text":"The amino ester obtained was purified by converting the amino ester hydrochloride salt by dissolving in acetone 100ml and Conc. Hydrochloric acid 25ml.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":151}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"906mf","text":"The solution was kept in refrigerator at 5℃ for 16 hours. The hydrochloride salt obtained was dissolved in DCM (75 ml) and washed with 10% sodium carbonate solution (50ml, twice), water (50ml, twice) and brine solution (50 ml). The organic layer was dried over anhydrous magnesium sulphate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":290}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e2nh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa3v6","text":" Formation of amino ester hydrochloride salt \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":45}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nji9b8dp7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nji7b8dp7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nji8b8dp7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/nji6b8dp7.webp","width":426}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ep1vk","text":"The crude oily liquid obtained from first step (6.6g, 0.18 mmol) was dissolved in ethyl alcohol 75ml and Glucono delta lactone (C6H10O6) 3.6g (0.02mol) was added.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":162}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78a77","text":"The progress of the reaction was monitored by TLC.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":50}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcgn9","text":"After completion of the reaction, ethyl alcohol was removed by using rotary evaporator.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":87}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"effi","text":"The crude compound was dissolved in THF and filtered hot.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"69fsp","text":"The THF was removed to get colourless powder.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":45}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9tcr","text":"The powder obtained was further purified by recrystallisation in acetonitrile to get the colourless solid.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":106}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69uce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b3k7i","text":" condenser\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":32}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjrb8dp7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjpb8dp7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjqb8dp7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjnb8dp7.webp","width":550}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"height":336,"id":402737,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"jr1o\",\"text\":\" gelator\\n\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[{\"style\":\"bold\",\"offset\":0,\"length\":38}],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjzb8dp7.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjxb8dp7.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjyb8dp7.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/njjwb8dp7.webp","width":419}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7inau","text":"The dry gelator obtained after the process of recrystallization was weighed.The gelation properties were tested through the tube inversion test which, was done by dissolving the gelator using various solvents\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":208}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8c8cf","text":"The gelator was uniformly dissolved in liquid paraffin using a sonicator for 20 minutes at 60 ℃ which, which was very firm and stable even after 48 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":154}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fia4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fsde","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3u1mp","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13j91","text":" Gelator Volume (mg) Solvent (ml) Inference 500 De-ionised water -1.5 ml Gel was partially formed at 30° C 500 NaCl (20mM)  -1.5 ml Solvent is not completely miscible with the gelator 500 Acetone-1.5 ml Cracks are observed after the gel cools. 500 Toluene-1.5 ml Gel is formed after cooling (5 minutes) when kept in oil bath at 90° C  and the gel remains stable even after 48 hours 500 Paraffin- 1 ml Gel completely solidifies after 20 minutes. Its stable even after 48 hours. There are no cracks 500 Ethanol-1.5 ml Slight cracks were observed after 24 hours. hours"],[" 500 "," NaCl (20mM)  -1.5 ml ","The gelator was partially soluble in NaCl solution and the gel had become dry brittle after 24 hours"],[" 500 "," Acetone-1.5 ml ","The gelator had title: L-Leucine based supramolecular gelator
